title: Video Insights - Advanced Analytics
name: video_insights

steps.title: Calling Query Action on the Analytics Service
description:
Please specify the parameters below.
Granularity of your data is determined by the Dimensions parameter.
Granularity options are "day, hour, minute and tenSeconds".

summary: Use this workflow to access advanced analytics features
description:
In this recipe you will learn to use Video Insights, granular analytics of various aspects of your media and users behavior.

Supported metrics:

* playerImpression                                    
* playRequested                                     
* play
* estimatedMinutesWatched
* averageViewDuration
* playThrough25
* playThrough50
* playThrough75
* playThrough100
* playRatio
* averageViewDropOff
* view
* peakView

Supported dimensions: 

* partner
* entry
* device
* [to add all dimensions + combinations]
